item.title: ‘Harry Potter’ Series Star Dominic McLaughlin Says Putting on Costume for the First Time Was ‘Surreal’: ‘It Was the Dream Role, of Course’
item.description: Dominic McLaughlin, who will play Harry Potter in HBO’s upcoming series adaptation, has spoken about being cast in the iconic role for the first time. While promoting his new film “Grow&#8
